Subskills.name: Plague Domain
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of plague master.

Subskills.name: Toxology
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by plague master.

Subskills.name: Stacked Bacteria
Subskills.description: Poisoned from plague master inflicts additional stacks of poisoned.

Subskills.name: Flesh Melting
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Neverending Infection
Subskills.description: Increases the poisoned duration from plague master.

Subskills.name: Crippling Poison Vial
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun enemies.

Subskills.name: Escalating Illness
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of poisoned from plague master.

Subskills.name: Raise from the Pestilence
Subskills.description: Monsters killed by plague master spawn a toxic anomaly. Toxic anomalies seek nearby monsters exploding on hit dealing increased area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Boundless Agent
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of plague master.

Subskills.name: Pathogens
Subskills.description: Chance to summon a pool of bacteria and viruses on hit dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Concussive Effect
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Bulbonic Plague
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict plague on hit causing targets to become infected inflicting damage to monsters around them.

Subskills.name: Containment Breakout
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt and area of effect radius of plague master significantly. Increases the cooldown of plague master.
